body:
> Do we need any changes here for the Dockerfile build process? Or are the only changes during app startup with the DB?

I don't think so. As long as we run the `update_actions` command on the admin node around the same time we run the `migrate` command this should work fine. I considered making the Dockerfile run `npm run build` instead of running webpack directly, but held off as I don't think it's that important.
